short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension removes the player controls and title of a YouTube video

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will remove the player controls and title of a YouTube video once you click on the extension icon. This change happens until you reload the page and is intended to be used for screenshotting videos easily.
